entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse USA is on no. 47 in all countries for testing per million population. Check the chart. Why do these people lie all the time. The big man in WH tells us that no other country does as many tests as we do.  https://t.co/Vxqih2qAKB
